mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_service_package_price ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, min_price, max_price, service_id, region_id) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{minPrice}, #{maxPrice}, #{serviceId}, #{regionId});
mapper.select: SELECT spp.id, spp.min_price AS minPrice, spp.max_price AS maxPrice, spp.service_id AS serviceId, spp.region_id AS regionId, r.name AS regionName FROM b_service_package_price spp left join tb_region r on spp.region_id=r.id WHERE spp.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
DELETE FROM b_service_package_price WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
